name: Alabama Smith: Escape from Pompeii
summary: Join a young archaeologist for an amazing adventure in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii. Help Alabama search for hidden clues, solve perplexing puzzles, and discover the truth about the Amulet of the Ages. Will Alabama solve the mystery before it's too late? Will Anastasia be able to save him from the eruption of Mount Vesuvius? Find out in Alabama Smith - Escape from Pompeii Deluxe!
